title: Not sure why I am banned?
body: Unsure as to why I'm banned. Haven't played my account in a while.. not sure if it was hacked or something? I haven't played in a year.

replies.body: It looks like this account was banned for toxic chat behavior about midway through last year. If you don't remember what happened or why it warranted this final punishment you can always hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
